title: parvatavardhanI
sahitya:
parvatavardhanI pAhimAm parashiva tatva svarUpiNi shrI


anupallavi

 parvata rAjanuta prasAdini prasiddha guruguha varaprasAdini 
sarva pApa prashamani shankari sAmagAna vinOdini dhanini


caraNam   rAmanAtha manOllAsini rAmacandra pUjita vilAsini 
kOTi tIrtha lAvaNya shAlini kOmaLatara caraNayugaLa naLini 
kAma janaka vidhIndra tOSiNi kanatkanaka tATanka bhUSiNi 
kavi janAdinuta sEtu madhya gandhamAdana parvata vihAriNi
